comments:
Got this error when opening "resolved" Bug 144155. After that editor tab did not appear.

Eugene, I've committed an interim solution so that a decent error is displayed if retrieval of the report fails.  I'll be upgrading the error handling today though along with the common editor refactoring (bug# 138043).
Fixed along with bug 146365 and the progress on bug 138043.

traces.message: White space is required after keyword SYSTEM in DOCTYPE decl.
